name: David Francisco | Games Development - 3D Game Assessment
name_original: David Francisco | Games Development - 3D Game Assessment
description: Coin Collector Adventure is a 3D platformer game that player is a small or mini robotic tank name or known as BoomBoom. The objective for the player is to collect the coins as for which the obstacles are mostly jumping on each pad or platform; as the goal of the player is not to fall off from each obstacle however in the end of the game there are big enemies to where the player should avoid. The game will restart if you die from the enemies or fall, as the player’s progress will also restart.
